item.title: Using market valuations in an NFL Pick'em Pool
item.description: This Fall, I’m playing in an NFL Pick’em contest with some friends from college. Each week, I predict the outcome of every NFL game according to Yahoo’s point-spread. For example, during Week 1 when the Patriots hosted the Texans, Yahoo assigned the Texans a seven-point handicap. My prediction came down to whether the Patriots would beat the Texans by more than seven points, or whether I thought the Texans would lose by no more than seven points (or win outright).
